> control wards are replacing pinks and working with the new stealth and camo changes. 
> 
> the plants are supposed to add more interest in the jungle and that and new champs are to keep interest in the game and allow it to grow

so many changes though. Still new champions like ivern and sol and more. ._. Maybe i can accept jg changes. But assassin changes are going to be hell for adcs xD

I'm more worried about the tanks than the assassins tbh. Because when assassins rise, tanks rise along to counter assassins. And while assassins can be dealt with as an ADC, tanks are a whole different matter.

In theory there should be a rock-paper-scissors situation in that assasins win against adcs but lose to tanks, tanks win against assassins but lose to adcs, and adcs win against tanks but lose to assassins. But adcs (except Kogmaw and Vayne) don't win against tanks so they just lose against both.
